mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_NAME = #{product_name}, CATEGORY_CODE = #{category_code}, PRODUCT_PRICE = #{product_price}, PRODUCT_STOCK = #{product_stock}, PRODUCT_INFO = #{product_info}, PRODUCT_DISCOUNT = (#{product_discount}*0.01), PRODUCT_PIC = #{product_pic}, PRODUCT_STATE = #{product_state} WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{product_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY_CODE = #{category_code} AND PRODUCT_STATE = 1 ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID DESC
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCT_ID, CATEGORY_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE,PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_INFO, PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, PRODUCT_STATE,PRODUCT_PIC) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(PRODUCT_ID)+1, 1) FROM PRODUCT), #{category_code}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_stock},#{product_info}, (#{product_discount}*0.01), 1,#{product_pic})
